text: James Bernard Carroll (January 10, 1856 – January 8, 1932) was an Associate Justice of the Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court from January 20, 1915 until his death. He had previously served as Associate Justice of the Massachusetts Superior Court (December 21, 1914 – January 20, 1915). == References == * Category:Justices of the Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court Category:1856 births Category:1932 deaths
title: James Bernard Carroll
